name: Dementia (itch)
description:
DEMENTIA is a Final Year Project made during 5 months at Haute Ecole Albert Jacquard (Belgium).

The purpose was to create a playable project on Unity 5 running at 60FPS on PS4. 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

TEAM :
  • Artist : Jonas ARMELLINI, Timothy COLIN, Alec CORNET
  • Animator : Clovis ROUECHE
  • Programmer : Louison HERNOUX
